definitions.text: alternative names for the body of a human being
examples: the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

definitions.text: make by combining materials and parts
examples: this little pig made his house out of straw
Some eccentric constructed an electric brassiere warmer
Resistance to the manager's plan built up quickly
Pressure is building up at the Indian-Pakistani border

definitions.text: order, supervise, or finance the construction of
examples: The government is building new schools in this state

definitions.text: give form to, according to a plan

examples: These architects build in interesting and new styles
build a defense on nothing but the accused person's reputation
ramp up security in the airports
Suspense was building right from the beginning of the opera
